scripts.deploy:testnet: bash -c 'export $(cat .env | xargs) && ETHERSCAN_API_KEY=dummy forge script script/Deploy.s.sol --tc DeployTestnet --rpc-url https://testnet.riselabs.xyz --broadcast --private-key $DEPLOYER_PRIVATE_KEY --verify --verifier blockscout --verifier-url https://explorer.testnet.riselabs.xyz/api/'
scripts.withdraw: bash -c 'export $(cat .env | xargs) && forge script script/Withdraw.s.sol --rpc-url https://testnet.riselabs.xyz --broadcast --private-key $DEPLOYER_PRIVATE_KEY'
scripts.admin:unpause: bash -c 'export $(cat .env | xargs) && cast send 0xe17C645aE8dC321B41BA00bbc8B9E392342A0cA2 unpause() --rpc-url https://testnet.riselabs.xyz --private-key $DEPLOYER_PRIVATE_KEY'
scripts.admin:setMinReserve: bash -c 'export $(cat .env | xargs) && cast send 0xe17C645aE8dC321B41BA00bbc8B9E392342A0cA2 "setMinReserve(uint256)" $(cast to-wei $0 ether) --rpc-url https://testnet.riselabs.xyz --private-key $DEPLOYER_PRIVATE_KEY'
